name: 2D Shooter (prl12503927)
description:
2D shooter final project for msu on Coursera

Modifications:

  • Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  • Reskin the existing graphics in some significant way. (Metal Slug. Player into Astro Slug and enemies into various Martian units)

Created by Ruilin Peng
